mapper.select: select * from js_novice_continue_record where uid = #{uid} order by id limit 0,1

select count(ncr.id) from js_novice_continue_record ncr left join dr_member m on ncr.uid = m.uid LEFT JOIN dr_member_base_info mbi on ncr.uid = mbi.uid
and INSTR(mbi.realname,#{realName}) > 0 and m.recommCodes = trim(#{recommCodes}) and INSTR(m.mobilePhone,#{mobilePhone}) > 0 and ncr.period = #{period} and ncr.status = #{status} and DATE_FORMAT(ncr.addTime,'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startAddTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endAddTime},'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(ncr.addTime,'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(ncr.shouldtime,'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startShouldTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endShouldTime},'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(ncr.shouldtime,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by ncr.addTime desc
mapper.update: update js_novice_continue_record set investId = #{investId},status=#{status} where id = #{id}
